paper_abstract: Fault Tolerant Contact Map Reconstruction (FT-COMAR) is a heuristic algorithm for the reconstruction of the protein three-dimensional structure from (possibly) incomplete (i.e. containing unknown entries) and noisy contact maps. FT-COMAR runs within minutes, allowing its application to a large-scale number of predictions.
paper_title: FT-COMAR: fault tolerant three-dimensional structure reconstruction from protein contact maps
